text.section: It is the intent of the General Assembly to provide rigorous academic and career and technical education programs that are relevant for all students and that encourage at-risk students to graduate from high school prepared to enter postsecondary education institutions or the workforce with needed skills.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 1, effective April 19, 2012. -- Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 2, effective June 21, 2001.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/19/2012). 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 10, provides that the Act, which included an amendment to this statute, shall be known as the "Career Pathways Act of 2012."
